thread.section_title: MAXBACK Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MAXBACK | www.maxback.com | 2 of 49
thread.title: Elizabeth

author: Elizabeth
title: Elizabeth
text:
Here's the deal everyone reading this:
So my Fitbit band broke. It was my 5th one and I was searching for a way to get rid of it besides throwing it in the trash. I called Fitbit to get a replacement band. Then, I found MaxBack thru a Google search and arranged to send in my device. I had the device and new band so I sent them in but forgot to send the frame. In fact, I thought I threw it away by accident. MaxBack sent me a Quote: for 22.00 because the frame was missing and I accepted it. A day later I found my frame, contacted MaxBack, spoke to Susie the Wonder Sleuth she told me to go ahead and send it in and they would try to work out a deal for me. Susie was amazing. Called back 2 days later and Susie said they had received the frame and MaxBack sent me another Quote: within hours. Very good customer service and helpful. I will be using this site again and will recommend to friends.
